prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
SUMMARY										
Have extensive IT Industry 7+ experience in  Analysis, Design and Development of applications.
Proven ability to architect and mange projects, manage resources, interact with clients, coordinate and work in achieving high levels of productivity and efficiency in complex, dynamic and challenging environments.
Experience in building applications using ASP.Net Core Web Api, gRPC, RabbitMQ, Service Bus.
Architecting and designing solutions based on Microsoft Azure: App Service, Web App, Mobile App, Logic App, API App, Azure Search, API Management, Notification hubs.
Architecting and designing Azure Database Solutions: Azure SQL DB, Azure MySQL, SQL Datawarehouse, Cosmos DB.
Azure container services, professional in Docker, Kubernetes.
Strong Experience in Design and Development of Applications based on Dotnet Core, Angular, Azure and MS SQL Server.
Working experience DevOps pipeline dev/test/QA/ production in Azure DevOps and Jenkins.
Proficient in OOAD with strong OOP (Object Oriented Analysis, Design and Programming) skills.
Designed Data Access Layer, Entity Framework, and Excellent experience on Core MVC, C#, ASP.NET Core, ADO.NET, .NET Framework 4.0 or above, SQL Server. 
Excellent experience in implementing Microservices, Web API2, WCF, Web Service which communicates data in a both XML & JSON.
Expertise in UI Designing & Scripting using Angular, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, Advanced CSS, Java Script, jQuery library, TypeScript, NodeJS.
Extensive experience in Relational Database Design, Data Modelling, Query Optimization and Implementation of database objects like Tables, Views, Stored Procedures, Functions and Triggers using MS SQL Server.
Experience with SSIS & SSRS (SQL Server Integration Service & Reporting Services).
Experience with training and mentoring team members with product knowledge and business processes.
A team player with strong interpersonal and communication proficiency
Implemented the Encryption Libraries like AES, DES and MD5 for s
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
